column2: "Oh! Did you find one? Thank you! Please, tell me all about it right now!"

"Its wide base and number of legs gives it stability, and it moves its torso around to keep its balance...
I see!"
"If I can use this as a basis for the statue's appearance and internals, I think I can pull this off!"
"My Halloween horror statue will dominate the center of the venue! As for what it'll look like, I'm going to keep that a secret until we open!"
